import React, { useState } from 'react' import Image from '../../../Components/UI/Images/Image' import SubmitButton from '../../../Components/UI/Button/Button' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import illustrate from '../../../Assets/Imagesused/login.png' import './Login.css' const OTP = () => { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState(false); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset } = useForm({ mode: "onTouched" }); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data); reset(); } return (

OTP Verification

Enter One Time Password(OTP) sent to your email.

{errors.email?.message}

Resend OTP

) } export default OTP
